title: Lux AP Item Changes
body:
So before 8.4, the obvious path for Lux was  {{item:3165}} but with the changes its {{item:3285}}  at least from OPGG.

Going for {{item:3285}}  is causing me a lot of mana problems, and going for {{item:3040}} makes building it up as Lux less than optimal.
I'm at a loss as to what to do.

I like the addition of {{item:3907}}  and {{item:3905}} , I think it makes gameplay...different.

What do you guys think and what has been your build paths?

replies.body: I'm still a bit confused by what to build on some mages ({{champion:101}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:74}} ), but I guess we're just going to get used to it
Ludens was already a common first build, though. You just need to not spam E or spam in general.
